title: Shrinkflation
dc:creator: WBUR
description: From the supermarket to the housing market, products are getting smaller but prices are not. Why is this happening? And can it be stopped before the toilet paper roll disappears right before our very… reaching hands?
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Shrinkflation
itunes:summary: From the supermarket to the housing market, products are getting smaller but prices are not. Why is this happening? And can it be stopped before the toilet paper roll disappears right before our very… reaching hands?

media:content.media:description: Melanie's size comparison of a square of Charmin Ultra Soft toilet paper from a newer package on top of a square from an older package.
